SELECT a.strf_id as strfId, category , a.title as strfTitle , a.lat as latit , a.lng as longitude a.address , a.post , a.tell , a.start_at as startAt, a.end_at , a.open , a.close , a.rest_date as restDate, a.explain , a.detail , a.location_detail_id as locationId, a.busi_num as busiNum , e.amenity ,e.title as amenityTitle , f.price , f.menu_id as menuId , f.title as menuTitle , f.menu_pic as menuPic
FROM stay_tour_restaur_fest a JOIN location b ON a.location_id = b.location_id JOIN business_num c ON a.busi_num = c.busi_num JOIN amenipoint d ON a.strf_id = d.strf_id JOIN amenity e ON d.amenity_id = e.amenity_id JOIN menu f ON a.strf_id = f.strf_id JOIN user g ON g.user_id = c.user_id WHERE strf_id = #{strfId}
SELECT AVG(rating) as ratingAvg FROM review a JOIN schedule b ON a.schedule_id = b.schedule_id WHERE strf_id = #{strfId}

SELECT review_id , a.content , a.rating , a.user_id , c.schedule_id , created_at , updated_at , b.profile_pic as userPic, b.name , e.review_pic as reviewPic , FROM review a JOIN user b ON a.user_id = b.user_id JOIN schedule c ON a.schedule_id = c.schedule_id JOIN stay_tour_ restaur_fest d ON d.strf_id = c.strf_id JOIN review_pic e ON e.review_id = a.review_id WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
